params.amountsOut: Value of the final amount out

params._uniswapNFTPositionManagerId: is the id of the Uniswap NFT position*

params._amountIn: is the amount of the token to convert
params._amountOutMin: is used to prevent the transaction from failing if the price of the token changes - 0 for no check
params._exchangePath: is the path to use for the swap - empty for the default path*
params._tokenAddress: is the address of the token to convert

returns._0: bool true if the tokenAddress is an accepted token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._exchangePathToCUSD: uniswap path to exchange the token to CUSD
params._exchangePathToPACT: uniswap path to exchange the token to PACT*
params._lpMinLimit: minimum amount of funds that need to be in the treasury (and not to be used for LP)
params._lpPercentage: percentage of the funds to be used for LP
params._lpStrategy: strategy to use for splitting the LP fees between treasury and buyback
params._rate: rate of the token in CUSD
params._uniswapNFTPositionManagerId: id of the NFT position manager

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newCommunityAdmin: address of the new CommunityAdmin contract

params._newDonationMiner: address of the new DonationMiner contract

params._newLpSwap: address of the new LpSwap contract

params._newPACT: address of the new PACT contract

AmountConverted(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Triggered when a token has been set

CommunityAdminUpdated(address,address).notice: Triggered when CommunityAdmin has been updated

TokenRemoved(address).notice: Triggered when a token has been removed

TokenSet(address).notice: Triggered when a token has been set

TransferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address

collectFees(uint256).notice: Collects the fees of a Uniswap NFT position

convertAmount(address,uint256,uint256,by.notice: Converts an amount of a token to cUSDs

getConvertedAmount(address,uint256).notice: Gets the amount of cUSDs that can be obtained from a converting the given amount of a token*

initialize(address).notice: Used to initialize a new Treasury contract

isToken(address).notice: Returns if an address is an accepted token

setToken(address,uint256,uint8,uint256,u.notice: Used to set a new token

tokenListAt(uint256).notice: Returns the address of a token from tokenList

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address

useFundsForLP().notice: Uses part of the funds of a token to add liquidity to the Uniswap pool it is used by the DonationMiner when creating a new epoch it can also been used by the DAO when there are too many funds in the treasury*
